an4.174:1: Then the Venerable Ānanda approached the Venerable Mahākoṭṭhita and exchanged greetings with him.This sutta is exactly the same as4:73except that here Ānanda asks the questions and Mahākoṭṭhita responds.[n.883]Eetreats this sutta as a continuation of the preceding one, without counting it separately. Thus at this point Ee's numbering catches up with Ce and Be.
